body: Soooo I was a week away from getting my braces off, and I was playing in a volleyball game. Of course I called for the ball at the same time my friend did and we ended up bumping into each other. As I tried to get up, I was knocked down again and my teeth went straight down onto the gym floor. Hard. So yay I get my braces delayed ;-; Now my front tooth is sensitive and I might have to go to the dentist, and if it gets worse I might get a root canal I CRI EVERYTIME

title: About to get braces off but nahh

replies.body: Ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhh that sucks.  However I had 11 baby teeth pulled and had braces for 5 years.  Finally getting them off next month.  But your event sounds painful D:

Sorry to hear that D:
Don't mean to make you jealous, but thank god I don't have to get braces xD
